what: Data files that are stored in the data-raw folder
title: Stock assessment prioritization for West Coast groundfish
text: description data files needed conducting Stock Assessment Prioritization provided . recent assessment year SSC recommendation stored assess_year_ssc_rec.csv data-raw folder. file updated hand year update assessment year SSC recommendation next assessment. information used summarize_new_information() determine period time evaluate new survey data species. information used summarize_revenue() commercial tribal fisheries summarize_rec_importance() calculate adjustment factors scoring species assessed previous assessment cycle. Unfortunately, typically number things need corrected hand file. Rockfish species managed complex listed without Rockfish species name (e.g., China, Vermillion, etc.). tried grepping file using first word species name issues identifying correct values. duplicate entries (e.g., S 4010, S 3427, 4010-3428) multipel speciesthat need removed ensure correct OFL ACL values found. species issue : cowcod, shortspine thornyhead, longspine thornyhead, lingcod harvest specifications recent years species used within summarize_fishing_mortality() score average attainment. Groundfish Expanded Multiyear Mortality (GEMM) data used determine mortality species. data downloaded using nwfscSurvey::pull_gemm(). average catch species used within summarize_fishing_mortality() summarize_rec_importance() compare average OFL ACL. Future harvest specifications downloaded PacFIN APEX GMT008 report. often default alternative harvest specifications available harvest specifications considered likely adopted used. selection subjective. proposed harvest specifications upcoming management cycle species used within summarize_const_demand() identify species may pose future management constraint given recent average catches. Revenue information downloaded PacFIN using QueryBuilder available PacFIN online user account. columns used AGENCY_CODE, COUNCIL_CODE, PACFIN_GROUP_GEAR_CODE, PACFIN_SPECIES_COMMON_NAME, PACFIN_YEAR, AFI_EXVESSEL_REVENUE, FLEET_CODE, NOMINAL_TO_ACTUAL_PACFIN_SPECIES_NAME. data confidential stored public Github repository. PacFIN data ex-vessel revenue species used summarize_revenue() commercial tribal fisheries. information also used summarize_const_demand() gear type identify potential within sector constraints. Tribal importance captures value species Tribes based commercial sale susbsistance ceremonial uses. information provided Tribal representatives (data-raw/tribal_score.csv). Captures importance species state recreational fisheries. information provided State representatives (data-raw/recr_importance.csv). Abundance calculated recent assessment species. abundance values previous stock assessment prioritization cycle read initial data updated saved based upon models model_files folder. file previous cycle found data-processed/previous sap year/abundance_processed.csv updated file saved data-processed/current sap year/abundance_processed.csv. information used modifed summarize_stock_status(). Data NWFSC West Coast Groundfish Bottom Trawl Survey (WCGBTS). data pulled using nwfscSurvey::pull_catch() nwfscSurvey::pull_bio(). Data NWFS Hook--Line Survey. data maintained John Harms updated data file requested cycle. recent assessment model files 2017 onward. clean_model_files() used remove unnecessary model files within folder reduce number files saved. information model files used calculate stock status population metrics summarize_stock_status().

text: official recent average mortality come GEMM rather pull PacFIN. manage_file file containing management quantities provided special pull Rob Ames GMT016 table. special pull management quantities species across years issues fixed hand: Many rockfish species missing "Rockfish" names correct hand due grep issues first name used (e.g., China changed China Rockfish). file contain OFLs ACLs sablefish, longspine thornyhead, shortspine thornyhead. Quantities (OFLs,..) duplicated blue rockfish rougheye/blackspotted rockfish corrected hand.

title: Comparison between recent average mortality, OFLs, and ACLs. — summarize_fishing_mortality
text: gemm_mortality Groundfish expanded multiyear mortality species. R object created nwfscSurvey::pull_gemm(). harvest_spex R data objected filetered year using filter_years() containing historical groundfish harvest specifications OFLs, ABCs, ACLs across years West Coast groundfish. data downloaded PacFIN APEX report table 15 (provided Jason Edwards PacStates) stored data-raw folder (example: data-raw/GMT015-final specifications-2015 - 2023.csv) species R data object contains list species names calculate assessment prioritization.  csv file list species names stored data-raw folder ("species_names.csv") manage_quants names management quantities harvest_spex data object defines OFL ACL. vector used grep columns. allows easily shift ABC ACL needed.

title: Comparison between recent average mortality, OFLs, and ACLs. — summarize_fishing_mortality

Calculate importance by revenue — summarize_revenue
text: Summarize format commercial revenue data insert assessment prioritizaiton. Data pulled PacFIN filtering "P" Council records removing tribal research landing revenue estimates.  data file includes following columns PacFIN: AGENCY_CODE, COUNCIL_CODE, PACFIN_SPECIES_CODE, PACFIN_SPECIES_COMMON_NAME, NOMINAL_TO_ACTUAL_PACFIN_SPECIES_CODE, PACFIN_YEAR, FLEET_CODE, ROUND_WEIGHT_MTONS, AFI_EXVESSEL_REVENUE. AFI_EXVESSEL_REVENUE column adjusts inflation NOMINAL_TO_ACTUAL_PACFIN_SPECIES_CODE includes nominal species specific records. Exvessel revenue averaged select years species dollar values output 1,000s.

CSV saved data-raw. default NULL calculate revenue commercial fishery. assess_year R data object assessment year species data-raw/assess_year_ssc_rec.csv.
